Industrial-grade granular ammonium nitrate. Contains nitrogen up to 34.5%.
Suitable as a laboratory reagent or as a powerful nitrogen-based fertilizer for agricultural and horticultural applications. Due to its endothermic and hygroscopic properties, this compound is practical in cold packs and cooling solutions. Additionally, it is used in the formulation of fireworks, as well as certain herbicides and insecticides. 
Note: Recognize that ammonium nitrate is a strong oxidizer, posing risks of explosion or violent reactions when mixed with certain substances. Extreme caution is required when handling and storing this material. Shipping is limited to commercial premises or standalone residences. Deliveries to apartment buildings, multi-unit residences, or areas considered high-risk are prohibited.
Bulk Purchasing Guide: Orders exceeding 1 pound will prompt us to contact you for verification and may require additional documentation.
